1.0.name: wordpress/floating-social-media-icon
1.0.description:
This Plugin Links Social Media Icons to Your Social Media Profiles Twitter,Facebook,Pinterest,Youtube,Rss Feed,Linkedin,google plus...

A Quicklook

★ 20+ Icon Styles

★ Set Icon Size & Order

★ Multiple Widget & Shortcode Support

★ Auto/Manual Integration

★ Enable/Disable Floating

★ Most Downloaded Plugin With Floating Support

★ Less Load - Essential Social Medias Only

★ Easy to Configure

★ Detailed Help Documentation

★ Featured Plugin On Many Plugin Review Sites

You can make the icons to appear automatically or you can use social media widgets, shortcode or php code to display icons where ever you like to show. If you use the option to show it automatically.

Floating Social Media Ico
